title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder does not match expected behavior
description: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it is changing with settings.
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
